channel.title: Social Security Tools
channel.description: A Social Security calculator that makes understanding social security benefits simple. Runs entirely in your browser making the entire process secure and private.

item.title: Federal Taxation of Social Security Benefits
item.description: A Comprehensive Guide to Calculating the Taxability of Social Security Benefits Based on AGI.

item.title: Social Security International Agreements
item.description: How does working abroad affect social security?

item.title: Extra rules for those born on the 1st or 2nd of the month
item.description: Learn more about how Social Security law is affected by the day of the month one was born in.

item.title: Why does ssa.tools use the current year's indexing factors for someone younger than 62?
item.description: SSA.gov publishes estimated future indexing factors based on economic projections. Should ssa.tools use these factors and why?

item.title: The effect of AWI declining in 2020 due to Covid
item.description: For earners who were born in 1960, the effect of a potentially much lower average wage in 2020 may have an outsized impact on their lifetime benefit.

item.title: Earnings Cap
item.description: How do Social Security annual earnings caps work?

item.title: Maximum Benefits
item.description: What is the maximum possible Social Security benefit that someone can recieve?

item.title: Social Security and Inflation
item.description: Learn how two different types of inflation, wage increase and consumer price index, each interact to affect your social security benefit.
